item.description: Brrrrrr It’s freezing!!!! But, believe it or not, summer camp registration is just around the corner. Join Mothers and More for a discussion of summer camps—-preschool camps, day camps, overnight camps, and everything in between. We will be joined by Abby Shapiro, founder and President of CampSource, a free service that matches kids with overnight camps and teen programs. Abby will talk to us about choosing an overnight camp, and decisions about going it alone, with friends, in a group, etc. Join us for the discussion, and get the inside scoop from other moms. Additionally, we will have available a database of area day camps: areas of focus, contact information, registration deadlines, fees, etc. Don’t be left out in the cold, plan for camp now!
item.name: Choosing a Summer Camp
